Soul of Destiny.name: Soul of Destiny
Soul of Destiny.flavor: The energy of the Shadowfell threads through you and your allies, letting you share the power of your destiny.
Soul of Destiny.effect: You activate an aura 5 that lasts until the end of your next turn. While in the aura, you and each of your allies can use a minor action to lose a healing surge and gain temporary hit points equal to his or her healing surge value and a +4 power bonus to his or her next attack roll, skill check, or saving throw.
